name: Dragon's Communi-Tea Service
description:
Game Description

Dragon's Communi-Tea Service is a 3D platforming game combined with a tea-making simulator to create a whimsical experience. It features a so-called mighty dragon of chaos that has once caused nothing but mischief for a great wizard, now transformed into a teapot as a punishment for all the chaos the dragon caused.

Take on the role of the once-great dragon; run, jump, sprint, and collect to fulfill your orders in time, and earn back your true form.

Get ready for a Fantas-Tea-cal adventure!
